ActControlled Drugs and Substances Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Schedule to Part J â€” MDPV)
PrecisRegulations Amending the SCHEDULE TO PART J of the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (MDPV) in order to protect the health and safety of Canadians by listing Methylenedioxypyrovalerone which is a key ingredient in products known as "bath salts".
